missionSuccessStatementOverride: Good job out there. We decimated the enemy.
badFaithStatementOverride: This was a horrible preformance. The contract is terminated due to bad faith on your part.
goodFaithStatementOverride: You did your best. But without Alpha Site...I am sorry but the contract between us is terminated.
shortDescription:
Good job holding the attackers off so far. But we know they're gearing up for round two.

Unfortunately, the crew of the Alpha Site are reporting that the turret generator’s fuel tanks were damaged by enemy fire and are nearly empty, so you’ll be fighting without turret support. The security lance is about 30 minutes out, but they ran into pirates stragglers on their way, which has delayed them.

Hold off the pirates for 30 to 45 more minutes.
longDescription: Remember we just need to keep them distracted long enough to win this one

objectiveList.title: Ensure the fuel for the turret generator is unloaded safely
objectiveList.description: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.

objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance

dialogueContent.words: Commander, the Argo has detected 'Mech force movement North of the base!
This is it Commander. Seems like they follow same attack vector as last time.
Remember that we have no support this time people. Don't take chances down there, play it safe!
Break is over people! There is 350 people inside the base - let's keep them alive!

{MC.If.PlayerLances.Speaker.HasTag.pilot_officer}<color=#85DBF6FF>[Officer background]</color> Word of advice, Commander. Let them come to us and hold your fire until we're certain of a hit. They have few tactical options in this terrain - they're bound to try and flank us from the right, aiming to enfilade our lance just like last time.
Security Lance has reached the AO...The pirates supply vehicles are retreating.
This is Zvezda Security broadcasting on all open channels to bandit forces - You are surrounded. Power down your 'Mechs, and you will be dealt with fairly.
Security lance has already engaged their supply vehicles trying to flee the AO. The Pirate 'Mechs seem to be disengaging.
That's unfortunate, Commander. Time to cut our losses. I am sending over exfil position
We'll detach the fuel trailers and let the Alpha crew handle refueling the turret generator. My APCs will now join the defense, but don't expect miracles from them.
Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from the east. More pirates it seems...
Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.
Damn...That was the housing for the workers' families.
Commander, the enemy is targeting the building housing the base' life support. We lose that one, we lose the fight.
Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, Security 'Mech lance is there in 20 minutes.

Commander, if we get solid confirmation that the enemy has committed all their forces at your position, I’ll redeploy our security lance to support you. With a bit of luck, we’ll be able to hit their forces from behind.
One more thing - the earlier probing attacks on Alpha Site have drained the turret generator’s fuel supply.
I've dispatched APCs with fuel trailers to Alpha Site and they should be arriving any moment now.
Escort them safely into the base and we’ll have those automated turrets back online.
Good luck out there, Commander.
